Name: Names of elected officials appearing on signs posted at capital construction project sites funded by the city.
Title: A Local Law to amend the New York City Charter in relation to names of elected officials appearing on signs posted at capital construction project sites funded by the city.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
      Section 1.   Section 217 of the New York City Charter is hereby amended by adding a new paragraph (e) to read as follows:
      e.  No sign bearing the name of any elected official, shall be posted at the site of any capital construction project funded by the city.
ï¿½2.  This local law shall take effect immediately.
